thread.title: New restrictions for movie-goers in Greensboro

author: Carolyn Conte
title: New restrictions for movie-goers in Greensboro
text:
Greensboro movie theatre implements curfew for young adults
Greensboro movie theatre implements curfew for young adults
THE TOP STORIES THAT WE ARE FOLLOWING IN OUR NEWSROOM. THE MAN ACCUSED OF SHOOTING TWO PEOPLE AT A WINSTON-SALEM HOTEL WILL FACE A JUDGE TODAY. YESTERDAY MORNING, OFFICERS FOUND ONE MAN SHOT IN THE LOBBY OF THE AMERICA’S BEST VALUE INN ON AKRON DRIVE. AND THEN A SECOND GUNSHOT VICTIM LATER ARRIVED AT THE HOSPITAL. BOTH WERE TREATED FOR NON-LIFE THREATENING INJURIES, ACCORDING TO POLICE, AND THEY LATER ARRESTED 28 YEAR OLD TYSHAWN LOVINGGOOD IN LEXINGTON ON THIS CASE, NORTH CAROLINA STATE UNIVERSITY WILL SOON HAVE A NEW POLICE CHIEF. UNIVERSITY POLICE CHIEF JERMAINE CHERRY’S LAST DAY IS TODAY. HIS RETIREMENT WAS ANNOUNCED EARLIER THIS MONTH. HE SAID HE STARTED WORKING IN THE DEPARTMENT IN JULY OF 2016, BEFORE TAKING OVER AS CHIEF IN AUGUST OF 2021. THIS IS VIDEO FROM WHEN HE WAS SWORN IN AS CHIEF. NO WORD YET ON WHO WILL REPLACE HIM. LOOKING AHEAD, THE FORSYTH COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES IS IMPLEMENTING A WAIT LIST FOR ITS CHILDCARE VOUCHERS. THE DEPARTMENT HAS ALREADY REACHED ITS BUDGET CAPACITY, SO THE WAIT LIST WILL GO INTO EFFECT THIS SUNDAY, SEPTEMBER 1ST. YOU CAN FIND ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS AND THE DIFFERENT WAYS TO BE ADDED TO THE LIST RIGHT NOW ON WXII 12.COM. AND THAT STORY ALSO INCLUDES FORSYTH D. S COMMUNITY PARTNERS TH

Greensboro movie theatre implements curfew for young adults
A movie theater in Greensboro has implemented a new curfew. Red Cinemas reports that from now on, for Thursdays through Sundays, guests under 18 years old must be accompanied by an adult over 21 years old. The curfew applies to any showtime, under any rating, according to the theater. The theater was unable to share with WXII why they decided to implement it.It's not clear when the policy was decided, either.
